data.what_is: Boingnet is a Direct Marketing Automation platform for direct mail marketers, agencies and printers. Boingnet marketers develop powerful multi-channel with Personalized URLs (pURLs) that track response, personalize web and email channels and integrate with marketing automation and CRM platforms. Our new Audiences feature lets you use any web, landing or e-commerce platform, while getting the personalization and tracking of traditional pURL systems. Sign up for a no-risk, 60 Day Free Trial today.
data.product_description: Boingnet is a Lightweight Marketing Automation designed for SMB's and Agencies. Boingnet features multi-channel and cross-channel campaign management, with integrated landing page, email, drip and mobile marketing, all with easy to use personalization. Lightweight Marketing Automation means easy to use, easy to set up, no contract and lightweight pricing.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Boingnet?
It is useful for sending to emails who have not opted in. It allows one to send emails to any and all emails that have not opted in which is more functionality then other platforms.

What do you dislike about Boingnet?
The platform was hard to use, the templates were pretty bad, there was always issues with the way the email would appear. I also had a difficult time uploading images and genuinely customizing the emails. Also the staff wasn't great at helping with troubleshooting.

Recommendations to others considering Boingnet:
If you want to email those who have not opted in communication, which I believe is only legal in the United States, then Boingnet it useful. Other platforms will not allow this functionality so Boingnet has a leg up. That said, building emails is difficult and annoying for reasons such as not being to change font, or upload photos easily, or format where the photos will go. Even if you have HTML coding skills, it is complex and difficult to go into the back end and fix via html code.

What problems is Boingnet solving and how is that benefiting you?
Send out emails for our own marketing. Being able to send to a broad list that has not opted in.
